# WhatsApp Chat Analyzer

This project analyzes chat data to extract insights from WhatsApp conversations using Python/NLP techniques.

## Overview
- Goal: Learn trends and sentiment in chat messages.
- Methods: Python, Pandas, NLP, Visualization.
- Outcome: Interactive visualizations and metrics for communication patterns.

## Key Features

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Example: load chat data
df = pd.read_csv("assets/chat_data.csv")
df['hour'] = pd.to_datetime(df['timestamp']).dt.hour
df['hour'].hist(bins=24)
plt.title("Message Distribution by Hour")
plt.show()
